articles.author: University of Tokyo
articles.title: Ancient canoe replica tests Paleolithic migration theory - Phys.org
articles.description: When and where the earliest modern human populations migrated and settled in East Asia is relatively well known. However, how these populations moved between islands on treacherous stretches of sea is still shrouded in mystery.
